{{Description|Certified player Choneaux, a reporter always looking for that exclusive scoop. Such news isn't that easy to come by, so he makes his own &mdash; for example, by covering duels between extraordinary card players. Though most readers haven't the slightest inkling about the players he mentions, those pieces earn enough to pay for both his expenditures and alcohol. Better than nothing, eh?|[[Map]] description}}
